products.name: Stouffer's Meat Lasagna Party Size Frozen Entree - Serves 12

extendedInfo.detail: With 100% pure beef, herb seasoned tomato sauce and real mozzarella cheese.  Per 1 Cup Serving: 270 calories; 4.5 g sat fat (23% DV); 890 mg sodium (39% DV); 5 g total sugars; 17 g protein (22% DV); 210 mg calcium (15% DV).  See nutrition information for sat fat & sodium content. Nutrition Compass: Nestle: Thoughtful Portion: 1 portion = 1 cup for a balanced menu enjoy with a side salad. Talk Food with Us: Text or call us 1-800-225-1180. Stouffers.com.  Contains a bioengineered food ingredient.  No preservatives. 2x the meat (Required by the lasagna with meat sauce standard). About 12 servings. Always hand-layered. Always delicious. Share a favorite dish with your family and friends.
extendedInfo.ingredients: Water, Tomato Paste, Cooked Beef, Semolina Wheat Flour, Low-Moisture Part-Skim Mozzarella Cheese (Cultured Part-Skim Milk, Salt, Enzymes), Part-Skim Mozzarella Cheese And Modified Cornstarch (Part-Skim Mozzarella Cheese Cultured Milk, Salt, Enzymes], Modified Cornstarch, Skim Milk, Flavors), Dry Curd Cottage Cheese (Cultured Skim Milk, Enzymes), 2% Or Less Of Modified Cornstarch, Salt, Soy Sauce (Water, Soybeans, Wheat, Salt), Wheat Flour, Dried Onions, Sugar, Parmesan Cheese (Cultured Milk, Salt, Enzymes), Spices, Garlic Powder.
extendedInfo.directions: Cook thoroughly. For food safety and quality, follow these. Cooking Instructions: Oven (Preheat 400 degrees F): Remove lid, save for later. Bake 35 minutes without lid (If cooking from thawed, follow steps 1 and 2. for step 3, reduce to 20 minutes without lid, then continue with steps 4 and 5. For step 6, reduce lidded cooking time to 50 minutes, then continue with steps 7 and 8) (Product may be thawed under refrigeration (40 degrees F) no more than 48 hours. Do not refreeze). Bake 65 minutes more with lid (If cooking from thawed, follow steps 1 and 2. for step 3, reduce to 20 minutes without lid, then continue with steps 4 and 5. For step 6, reduce lidded cooking time to 50 minutes, then continue with steps 7 and 8) (Product may be thawed under refrigeration (40 degrees F) no more than 48 hours. Do not refreeze). 1. Remove lid. Bend lid slightly in middle along short edges so that the ridge runs the length of the tray and is elevated 1 inch. Keep for use during second part of cooking. 2. Place tray on baking sheet on center rack of 400 degrees F preheated oven. 3. Bake without lid for 35 minutes (If cooking from thawed, follow steps 1 and 2. for step 3, reduce to 20 minutes without lid, then continue with steps 4 and 5. For step 6, reduce lidded cooking time to 50 minutes, then continue with steps 7 and 8) (Product may be thawed under refrigeration (40 degrees F) no more than 48 hours. Do not refreeze). 4. Carefully remove tray from oven. 5. Carefully rest 1-inch tented lid on tray, so it is elevated over lasagna. 6. Bake on baking sheet for an additional 65 minutes (If cooking from thawed, follow steps 1 and 2. for step 3, reduce to 20 minutes without lid, then continue with steps 4 and 5. For step 6, reduce lidded cooking time to 50 minutes, then continue with steps 7 and 8) (Product may be thawed under refrigeration (40 degrees F) no more than 48 hours. Do not refreeze). 7. Carefully remove tray from oven and remove lid. 8. Let stand 15 minutes to complete cooking and for optimal serving. Will be Hot! Ensure product reaches an internal temperature of 165 degrees F. Oven vary; cooking time may need adjusting.  Keep frozen.  To Open: Pull tab.
